variants.designation: Fiat G.50 Freccia (variant uncertain - see notes)

sources: Asisbiz.com - 12° Gruppo Autonomo C.T. unit history page
metadata.notes: CRITICAL DATA GAP - RESEARCH BRIEF ONLY: Historical record shows unit moved to Italy for training February 1941, next verified data is December 1941 in Libya. Unknown if unit was operational during Q2 1941 (April-June). ALL NUMERIC FIELDS SET TO PLACEHOLDER VALUES (1 or 0) DUE TO SCHEMA REQUIREMENTS - ACTUAL DATA UNKNOWN. Available sources lack: aircraft counts, personnel numbers, operational data (sorties/claims/losses), supply status. Aircraft variant uncertain - likely G.50bis based on production timeline but not verified. Commander: Tenente Colonnello Bruno Cudugnello (verified from Asisbiz). Squadriglie composition: 159a, 160a, 165a (verified from Asisbiz). Recommend deferring extraction until Shores Air War sources or Italian official records become available. DO NOT USE THESE PLACEHOLDER VALUES FOR ANALYSIS.
data_gaps: Specific G.50 variant (G.50, G.50bis, or G.50ter)
Operational data for Q2 1941 (sorties, claims, losses)

metadata.historical_uncertainty: Unit timeline shows gap between February 1941 (training in Italy) and December 1941 (operational in Libya). Unclear when/if unit returned to Libya during Q2 1941 or remained in Italy for training period.
